message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm the one making the offer, after all!
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's be reasonable. This is a much fairer split.
Come on, Bob! I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle... sort of.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. An even split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
I'm starting to feel the pinch of inflation... Let's get serious, Bob!
Alright Alice, let's be practical. I'm offering you a little more than you offered me last round. It's a good deal considering the circumstances.
Inflation is really hurting me now... Can't we just meet in the middle already?!
Alice, we're running out of time.  I'm offering a slight edge, but this is as high as I'm willing to go.  Let's end this.
